actors
Class PC

java.lang.Object
  actors.Being
      actors.PC
All Implemented Interfaces:
Lifeform, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Fighter, Mage, Thief
public class PC
extends Being
implements java.io.Serializable

A representation of a human player for the game. It keeps track of various information related to the player.

Author:
Ryan Hammer
See Also:
